verse: बर्हापीडं नटवरवपु: कर्णयो: कर्णिकारं बिभ्रद् वास: कनककपिशं वैजयन्तीं च मालाम् । रन्ध्रान् वेणोरधरसुधया पूरयन्गोपवृन्दैर्वृन्दारण्यं स्वपदरमणं प्राविशद् गीतकीर्ति:

terms.बर्हापीडं: Wearing peacock feathers on the head
terms.नटवरवपु:: Having the best form like that of a dancer
terms.कर्णिकारं: The earrings made of mighty Karṇikāra flowers
terms.वेणोरधरसुधया: With the nectar-like sound of his flute
terms.गीतकीर्ति:: The one whose fame is sung in the form of music

meaning: Meaning:The Lord, with peacock feathers adorning his head,Having the best form like that of a dancer,Wearing earrings made of Karṇikāra flowers,Dressed in garments of golden yellow color,And wearing the Vaijayanti garland,Piercing the hearts of the cowherd boys and girls,Entered the abode of his lotus feet,The fame of whom is sung in the form of music.
